description: The construction of 7 part two/part three/part four storey blocks comprising a total of 38 one bedroom flats, 56 two bedroom flats, 3 two bedroom houses and 6 three bedroom houses on the site of the Former Council Depot/Service Centre Workshops, Downham Lane, Downham, Bromley, Kent, together with landscaping, provision of refuse stores, cycle parking, 81 car parking spaces and the formation of an access road off Downham Lane.
